metadata.title: CVE-2020-28367 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Code injection in the go command with cgo before Go 1.14.12 and Go 1.15.5allows arbitrary code execution at build time via malicious gcc flagsspecified via a #cgo directive.

criterions.comment: golang: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
golang-1.6: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
golang-1.10 package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
